message.fullMessage: fix: enhance release workflow by updating Nyx infer and adding version handling
message.shortMessage: fix: enhance release workflow by updating Nyx infer and adding version handling

message.fullMessage: fix: enable gitCommit and gitPush in Nyx configuration for proper release workflow
message.shortMessage: fix: enable gitCommit and gitPush in Nyx configuration for proper release workflow

footers.- Set gitPush: false in Nyx (avoid go-git 'object not found' issue)

message.fullMessage:
fix: disable Nyx gitPush and use workflow Git CLI for pushing tags

- Set gitPush: false in Nyx (avoid go-git 'object not found' issue)
- Add manual 'Push Tags' step in workflow using Git CLI
- Remove git.remotes config (no longer needed)
- Remove gitPushForce option

This bypasses Nyx's go-git library issues by using GitHub Actions'
native Git CLI with workflow credentials. Nyx creates tags locally,
workflow pushes them using the configured GITHUB_TOKEN.
message.shortMessage: fix: disable Nyx gitPush and use workflow Git CLI for pushing tags

footers.- Set gitCommit: false to avoid orphan commits (only tags needed)

message.fullMessage:
fix: disable gitCommit and add Git remote credentials for Nyx push

- Set gitCommit: false to avoid orphan commits (only tags needed)
- Add git.remotes.origin credentials using GH_TOKEN for go-git library
- Add gitPushForce: false for safety

Fixes 'object not found' error during git push. Nyx's go-git library
needs explicit credentials configuration, separate from git CLI config.
message.shortMessage: fix: disable gitCommit and add Git remote credentials for Nyx push

message.fullMessage:
fix: clean state file on infer and enable gitTagForce

- Remove global resume: true from .nyx.yaml (use only in make/mark/publish)
- Add state file cleanup before infer for fresh version calculation
- Add gitTagForce: true to allow tag updates
- Fixes issue where Nyx was calculating 0.4.0 instead of 0.4.1

This ensures version bumps work correctly after existing tags.
message.shortMessage: fix: clean state file on infer and enable gitTagForce

footers.- Fix command sequence: infer → make → mark → publish (was missing mark)

message.fullMessage:
fix: add missing Nyx mark command and resume flags for proper release workflow

- Add Nyx mark step to create Git tags and commits before publish
- Add --resume flag to make, mark, and publish steps for state continuity
- Add resume: true to .nyx.yaml global config
- Fix command sequence: infer → make → mark → publish (was missing mark)
- Remove duplicate commitMessageConventions (already in simple preset)

This fixes the publish failures caused by missing Git tags. The publish
command requires tags to exist before creating GitHub releases.

Based on Mooltiverse Nyx documentation analysis via Context7.
message.shortMessage: fix: add missing Nyx mark command and resume flags for proper release workflow

message.fullMessage:
refactor: remove DI modules, add Spring example and fix config loading

- Remove inject package (I18nBuilder, I18nProvider, Guice/Dagger modules)
- Remove Guice and Dagger dependencies
- Add Spring integration example
- Add unit tests for I18n
- Fix config.load() missing call in loadLocaleFile()
- Update README with simplified API and Spring example
message.shortMessage: refactor: remove DI modules, add Spring example and fix config loading
